# OauthCancelledError

Constructor for initializing an error indicating that the OAuth flow was
cancelled.
:::note
`OauthCancelledError` extends `BaseError`, see the docs for BaseError for all supported methods.
:::

## Import

```ts
import { OauthCancelledError } from "@account-kit/signer";
```
